attributes.action: Limit MPs expenses allowances to travel costs to & from Westminster & 3 star hotel costs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is in line with what the majority of the British public are paid by employers if they work away from home.

MPs are the employees of the British public, or have they forgotten that.

Too many of our MPs agree and abide by the famous quote from that great writer George Orwell in ANIMAL FARM

ALL PIGS ARE EQUAL ONLY SOME ARE MORE EQUAL THAN OTHERS.

If MPs cannot remove their snouts from the trough then the Government should remove the trough from MPs

We the people challenge this government to prove that they are equal and not more equal or more deserving than the people that they are sworn to serve

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
